title: Amazon applies for first incentives for HQ2: As much as $152 million
description: The tech giant stands to receive up to $773 million in performance grants from state and local officials for the second headquarters it is building in Arlington.

title: 100 years of work: See how the office has evolved
description: A visual timeline of the past and future of the office spanning architecture, furniture, floor plans, computers, the dreaded cubicle and flexible work.

title: The AI bot has picked an answer for you. Here’s how often it’s bad.
description: The Post tested the reliability of Microsoft’s Bing AI chatbot by asking it 47 tough questions and then evaluating its sources.
